sentences.chinese: 樂統同，禮別異，禮樂之說貫乎人情矣。
sentences.literal: Music unifies sameness, ritual distinguishes difference; ritual and music's doctrine penetrates human emotion.
Exhausting the root and knowing change, music's essence;
Manifesting sincerity and removing falsity, ritual's canon.

sentences.chinese: 禮樂順天地之誠，達神明之德，降興上下之神，而凝是精粗之體，領父子君臣之節。
sentences.literal: Ritual and music follow heaven and earth's sincerity, reach the spirits' virtue, lower and raise the upper and lower spirits, and solidify this refined and coarse body, lead father-son ruler-minister relations.

sentences.chinese: 是故大人舉禮樂，則天地將為昭焉。
sentences.literal: Therefore when great men raise ritual and music, then heaven and earth will be enlightened.

sentences.chinese: 天地欣合，陰陽相得，煦嫗覆育萬物，然後草木茂，區萌達，羽翮奮，角觡生，蟄蟲昭穌，羽者嫗伏，毛者孕鬻，胎生者不殰而卵生者不殈，則樂之道歸焉耳。
sentences.literal: Heaven and earth joyfully unite, yin and yang mutually obtain; warm and nourish covering all things; then grasses and trees flourish, sprouts reach, winged ones soar, horned ones grow, hibernating insects become lively; feathered ones brood and nest, furred ones conceive and give birth, viviparous do not miscarry and oviparous do not break; then music's way returns there.

sentences.chinese: 樂者，非謂黃鐘大呂弦歌干揚也，樂之末節也，故童者舞之；
sentences.literal: Music is not speaking of yellow bell great lü string songs shield axe; music's final section; therefore children dance it;

sentences.chinese: 布筵席，陳樽俎，列籩豆，以升降為禮者，禮之末節也，故有司掌之。
sentences.literal: Spread mats and seats, arrange goblets and stands, arrange baskets and bowls; taking ascending and descending as ritual; ritual's final section; therefore officials manage it.

sentences.chinese: 樂師辯乎聲詩，故北面而弦；
sentences.literal: Music masters distinguish sound and poetry, therefore face north and play strings;

sentences.chinese: 宗祝辯乎宗廟之禮，故後尸；
sentences.literal: Ancestral invokers distinguish ancestral temple ritual, therefore follow the corpse;

sentences.chinese: 商祝辯乎喪禮，故後主人。
sentences.literal: Funeral invokers distinguish funeral ritual, therefore follow the host.

sentences.chinese: 是故德成而上，藝成而下；
sentences.literal: Therefore virtue completes and ascends, arts complete and descend;
Conduct completes and comes first, affairs complete and come later.

sentences.chinese: 是故先王有上有下，有先有後，然後可以有制於天下也。
sentences.literal: Therefore the former kings had upper and lower, had first and last; then could have regulation over the world.

sentences.chinese: 樂者，聖人之所樂也，而可以善民心。
sentences.literal: Music is what sages take joy in, and can improve the people's hearts.
